titles.title: The Law Of God Is Good And Wise

authors.author: from Klug's Geistliche Lieder auffs new gebessert, Wittenberg, 1543
Loy, Matthias (1828-1915)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The law of God is good and wise, And sets His will before our eyes, Shows us the way of righteousness, And dooms to death when we transgress.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Its light of holiness imparts The knowledge of our sinful hearts, That we may see our lost estate And seek deliv'rance ere too late.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: To those who help in Christ have found And would in works of love abound It shows what deeds are His delight And should be done as good and right.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When men the offered help disdain And willfully in sin remain, Its terror in their ear resounds And keeps their wickedness in bounds.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The law is good, but since the fall Its holiness condemns us all; It dooms us for our sin to die And has no pow'r to justify.
